Portfolio

As a PM, I always ask myself, If I were a product manager at such-and-such company, how do I make this-and-that better....

Now.gg | Cloud Gaming Platform

www.now.gg

Now.gg is a Cloud gaming service, giving gamers from all over the world instant access to their favorite Android games on any device, with the best graphics and performance. No downloads or installations are required on your device.

BlueStacks 5 | Multi Instance Manager

www.bluestacks.com

BlueStacks (also known as BlueStacks by now.gg, Inc.) is an American technology company known for the BlueStacks App Player and other cloud-based cross-platform products. The BlueStacks App Player allows Android applications to run on computers running Microsoft Windows or macOS. The Multi-Instance Manager makes it easy to play your favorite Strategy and Gacha games. Optimize your PC for the best performance even with multiple instances running in the background by using the 'Eco Mode' feature. Create, close, launch and remove instances in batches or arrange them in Grid or diagonal layout.

Dell Mobile Connect

www.dell.com

Dell Mobile Connect (also branded as Alienware Mobile Connect) provides a seamless wireless integration between smartphones and Windows 10 PCs, allowing you to perform many normal phone functions directly on your PC. Smartphone functions that Dell Mobile Connect allows you to perform on your Windows 10 PC

InfiViz | Shots and Dashboard

www.osdesignbuild.com

InfiViz Shots is a mobility component of InfiViz, a flagship visual data analytics product of Infilect. InfiViz Shots enables field agents of sales force companies, auditing agencies, or CPG organisations to capture high fidelity photos and videos of variety of tasks. InfiViz Shots can be used to capture photos and videos in any offline (i.e., physical world) environment to automate visual inspection and auditing processes. It runs on-device intelligent systems to capture and store photos and videos in the most appropriate form, format, size, and shape. Additionally, InfiViz Shots enables field agents to configure network preferences such that the captured visual data is synced with InfiViz cloud platform on 3G/4G/WiFi networks, as per the configuration.
